body.name: Anime Bedding Set - Soft Brushed Microfiber 68x90 Inches Duvet Cover Set, 3 Piece, 1 Duvet Cover with Zipper Closure and 2 Pillow Shams (Twin,Green)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 50 mins
Or fastest pickup Thursday, February 15. Order within 50 mins
features: Super Soft Duvet Cover Set: This Anime duvet cover set using premium microfiber fabric, this brushed duvet cover set offers exceptional softness so you can enjoy a restful night's sleep. Its smooth and breathable fabric provides maximum comfort without any crinkling noise.

Thoughtful Details: Four corner ties inside the Anime microfiber duvet cover provide a secure fit to prevent the fill from bunching or slipping. The hidden zipper allows you to seal your duvet faster (and easier) than with a traditional button closure.
Duvet Cover Set Size: This anime bedding set includes 1 Duvet Cover(NO STUFFING INSIDE): 68" x 90"(173 x 228cm) ; 2 Pillow Shams(No Pillow Core):20" x 30"(50 x 75cm).

Unique Design & Holiday Gift: Our wide selection of vibrant Anime colors for our bedding duvet covers. Anime duvet cover set fits seamlessly into any space, adds an extra element of personalization, making it easy to coordinate with your room's decor. Perfect as a great gift idea for men and women at special festival, such as housewarming, Christmas, Thanksgiving and birthday.

Easy Care and Cleaning: Our durable, machine washable, lightweight Anime duvet cover is wrinkle free, fade resistant, and made to last. Simply machine wash on a gentle cycle separately with cold water. Air dry or tumble dry low. Shop with confidence because no matter what, we’ve got you covered.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Anime Duvet Cover 3 Pieces Bedding Set The anime design makes your kids room look more cool and makes them life full of fun.

MICROFIBER FABRIC Anime bedding is made with premium polyester material, good air permeability, makes you feel comfortable and smooth. 4 CORNER TIES Built - in corner ties keep your comforter from sliding around and bunching up so you'll never have to feel frustrated by a duvet again. DOUBLE HIDDEN ZIPPER The zipper design makes it easier to change the quilt cover, and the double zipper is more durable. ENVELOPE PILLOW SHAMS The pillow shams are envelope closure so you can tuck your pillows inside easily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality, no fade, colors and patterns exactly as expected!!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I ordered this duvet cover and pillow cases for my son’s room for Christmas. We were looking for anime themed bedding and this was perfect for demon slayer theme. The duvet cover and cases are soft. Color do not fad after washing, follow wash instructions.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love it! The color is even better in person.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a nice set and is soft. The overall feel is nice and vary happy with it. You are paying a premium for a duvet cover and some pillow cases. If it's what you want you will be happy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Tanjiro duvet cover set
reviews.reviewText: My son loves that this is a Demon Slayer / Tanjiro duvet cover and pillow sham set. I love that it’s ridiculously soft and has a zipper! If you have ever had to button up a duvet cover, you’ll understand. We washed this as soon as it got here and put it over a down blanket. My son sleeps a little crazy so it does require realigning each day but that’s pretty normal for him, even with duvets that have ties inside them. This duvet cover does not have the ties in the corners to help keep the blanket in place. The bottom side of the blanket is white. This is also a plus when you are putting this over a blanket because you can quickly and easily tell where the seams are. This helps you grab the seam of the cover and the blanket inside together to shake it all into place. Overall this cover and sham set are great for Demon Slayer fans.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and well made!
reviews.reviewText: This twin size duvet cover is really nice to look at and also comes with two standard size envelope closure pillow shams/cases. There is a zipper closure and corner ties to keep your insert in place. I am pleasantly surprised at how soft and cozy this feels. The Tanjiro checked print is smaller on the pillow shams than it is on the actual duvet cover…I wasn’t sure if I liked that until I put it on the bed. But I think the smaller check print on the shams separates the pillows from the blanket really nicely. I think this is a great price for a well made and functional novelty item. This anime is really popular and these types of things usually cost quite a bit more. I am really quite impressed with this set and I would certainly recommend to any fellow demon slayer fans!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Anime comforter set
reviews.reviewText: Nice colors | Thick material | Soft | Great value | Easy to clean

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this Duvet cover. It’s soft. It was easy to put the duvet in. The hidden zipper is really hidden. It washed and dried well. The best part to me is getting 2 pillowcases. It’s a twin so that was really nice as most people like me use two. I’m not crazy about the pattern. I have the pink and for some reason it reminds me of spiders. It is a nice cover and I would recommend this if you like the patterns.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Super comfortable nice design
reviews.reviewText: This anime bedding set is a great gift for anyone who loves demon slayer or just anime in general. The pillow cases are very soft and don't have that cheap feeling to them. The duvet cover is a bit of a pain to get just right but once you get the blanket in the duvet cover I recommend trying to secure the corners in your preferred method. All in all this is a very comfy bedding set that I recommend to anyone who has a anime fan in their life or if you are one yourself.
